entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum was described as thin, dark, and sallow-skinned with a large curved nose and thick black eyebrows.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman yelled to introduce the Irish National Quidditch Team.

entities.name: connolly
entities.description: Connolly was one of the players in the Irish National Quidditch Team.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry used his Omnioculars to slow down the players and read their names.
